name: Negative Zone
description:
Negative Zone is a unique puzzle platformer in which you control two girls who explore a barren wasteland. The world is split up in black and white. Only the black girl can move through the white world, while the white girl can only stroll through the black world.

Both girls can turn themselves into a 'block' which creates a hole in the world, allowing the other girl to pass through parts of the other world. (see screenshots for how this works, it's difficult to explain in words).

Your goal is to keep yourselves alive by collecting pieces of food scattered throughout the levels. After all food is collected, lead each lady to the exit to finish the level.

This game is made for Ludum Dare 46.
